info.title: Traqa API
info.description: Traqa API to enable communication between Shippers and Load Sites for efficient exchange of data in the recycling supply chain

servers.description: User Acceptance Testing Url for Traqa API
Production Base URL for Traqa API
User Acceptance Testing Url for Traqa API V2
Production Base URL for Traqa API for V2

post.description:
Before making requests you need to authorise and exchange your username and password for an IdToken that can be passed in subsequent requests.
* The token will expire after 60 minutes.
* You can use the RefreshToken (which expires after 1 month).
* To refresh: send a POST request to the getToken endpoint with the header refresh_token.

get.description: Retrieve the identifiers of every party which the requestor has the permission to make requests on behalf of.
Retrieve the details for a pending or completed load in Traqa.

post.description: Create a loadplan in Traqa, making the data available to the `loading site` for them to complete the load once the vehicle or container is loaded at site.

alreadyCompleted.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to post loadplan details for a load which has already been 'completed' (loaded).

lackOfPermission.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to post loadplan details and specified a shipper which they do not have the permissions to act on behalf of.

get.summary: Retrieve loadplan(s) details by scheduled loading date
get.description: Retrieve the details for a pending or completed load in Traqa.  Using the planned `loading date` as the search term.

get.summary: Retrieve loadplan(s) details by loading reference
get.description: Retrieve the details for a pending or completed load in Traqa.  Using the `loading reference` as a search term.

get.summary: Retrieve loadplan(s) details by scheduled loading date week number
get.description: Retrieve the details for a pending or completed load in Traqa.  Using the `week number` of the planned loading date as a search term.

post.summary: Post the weighing record details for a load
post.description: Provide the weighing details from the weighbridge software to complete a load in Traqa.

alreadyCompleted.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to post weighing record details for a load which has already been 'completed' (loaded).

lackOfPermission.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to post weighing record details and specified a loading site which they do not have the permissions to act on behalf of.

get.summary: Retrieve the pre-Annex VII of a loadplan
get.description: Retrieve the `Pre Annex VII` a pending load in Traqa.  A document that represents the Annex VII before the load is completed.  Historically this document would be shared to the load site ahead of loading for them to fill in by hand.

multiplePermissions.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to retrieve a pre-Annex VII document but has multiple permissions, making the specified loading reference ambiguous as to which organisation it belongs to.

invalidLoadref.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to retrieve a pre-Annex VII document but has specified a loading reference which is not on record for the given organisation.

get.summary: Retrieve the Annex VII of a loadplan
get.description: Retrieve a clean copy the `Annex VII` for a completed load in Traqa.  A legal document that travels with the material during transport and would be signed by the recieving facility.

multiplePermissions.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to retrieve a Annex VII document but has multiple permissions, making the specified loading reference ambiguous as to which organisation it belongs to.

invalidLoadref.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to retrieve a Annex VII document but has specified a loading reference which is not on record for the given organisation.

post.summary: Add the Annex VII of a loadplan
post.description: Provide a copy of the `Annex VII` for a completed load in Traqa.

get.summary: Retrieve the Weighbridge Certificate of a loadplan
get.description: Retrieve the `Weighbridge Certificate/Ticket` for a completed load in Traqa.  A document that is used to proove the weights and provide load details.  Sometimes used as the `packing list` in customs.

multiplePermissions.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to retrieve a Weighbridge Certificate document but has multiple permissions, making the specified loading reference ambiguous as to which organisation it belongs to.

invalidLoadref.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to retrieve a Weighbridge Certificate document but has specified a loading reference which is not on record for the given organisation.

post.summary: Add the Weighbridge Certificate of a loadplan
post.description: Provide the `Weighbridge Certificate/Ticket` for a completed load in Traqa.  An optional upload by the loading site which will overwrite the Traqa produced weighbridge ticket with the load sites branded ticket.  This can be a scan/image/pdf file.

get.summary: Retrieve the Commercial Invoice of a loadplan
get.description: Retrieve the `Commercial Invoice` for a completed load in Traqa.  A document used and referenced in the export customs declaration.  Traqa can produce these for the shipper to support the ongoing customs process.

multiplePermissions.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to retrieve a Commercial Invoice document but has multiple permissions, making the specified loading reference ambiguous as to which organisation it belongs to.

invalidLoadref.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to retrieve a Commercial Invoice document but has specified a loading reference which is not on record for the given organisation.

get.summary: Retrieve the Export Accompanying Document of a loadplan
get.description: Retrieve the `Export Accompanying Document (EAD)` for a completed load in Traqa.  A document used and referenced in the export customs process to provide proof of a customs declaration and its outcome, contains the MRN and route from HRMC.

multiplePermissions.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to retrieve a Export Accompanying Document document but has multiple permissions, making the specified loading reference ambiguous as to which organisation it belongs to.

invalidLoadref.summary: Error message when requestor has attempted to retrieve a Export Accompanying Document document but has specified a loading reference which is not on record for the given organisation.

get.summary: Retrieve the photos of a loadplan
get.description: Retrieve `loading photos` for a completed load in Traqa.  Search by the `Loading Reference`.

post.description: Provide the `Loading Photos` for a given `Loading Reference` and `Shipper` to Traqa.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server
An unexpected error occurred on the server
An unexpected error occurred on the server

get.description: Retrieve the AI analysis text result for NILS tasks, taken from the Weighbridge tickets, hand completed Annex VII and other provided documents.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server

post.description: Provide the shipper reviewed text from the task to complete the open NILS task as a completed load in Traqa.

schema.title: Pagination token header
schema.description: Allows pagination of response. Passing this value in to subsequent requests retrieves subsequent values from a set.

schema.title: User-specific access token
schema.description: Access token (following OAuth 2.0 standard) with no prefix

shipperEORI.description: This format represents an EORI number. It starts with 'GB' followed by a 12 digit number.

shipperTraqaCode.description: This format represents a Traqa code. It starts with 'TQ'.

loadingSite.description: This represents a BIC Facility Code Identifier.

schema.title: Order of loadplans
schema.description: Orders retrieved loadplans by scheduled loading date. By default, in ascending order.

ascending.description: This orders the retrieved loadplans in ascending scheduled load-date.

descending.description: This orders the retrieved loadplans in descending scheduled load-date.

schema.title: Status of loadplans
schema.description: Filters retrieved loadplans by status. OPEN loads have yet to be loaded. COMPLETED loads are loaded. By default, retrieves loadplans of both statuses.

open.description: This retrieves loadplans that are not yet loaded.

completed.description: This retrieves loadplans that are loaded.

schema.title: Limit number of loadplans
schema.description: Limits how many loadplans are retrieved. By default, at most 250 loadplans are retrieved

smallLimit.description: This limits the response to 5 loadplans at most.

largeLimit.description: This limits the response to 100 loadplans at most.

schema.title: Scheduled loading date
schema.description: The planned date time of the loading at site, conform to yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss

schema.title: Loading reference
schema.description: The identifying reference of a loadplan.

WeekNumberPathParameter.name: weekNo
WeekNumberPathParameter.description: ISO Week number of the year

schema.description: Date-time of notification creation in ISO 8601 format

shipperEORI.description: This format represents an EORI number. It starts with 'GB' followed by a 12 digit number.

shipperTraqaCode.description: This format represents a Traqa code. It starts with 'TQ'.

errorMessage.description: A detailed error message providing more information about the error.

requestId.description: A unique identifier for the request.

requestTime.description: Date, time and timezone at which the relevant request was made.

Response400.title: 400 Response
Response400.description: Server cannot or will not process the request due to client error

Response403.title: 403 Response
Response403.description: The server understood the request, but it refuses to authorize it due to insufficient permissions or authentication failure.

Response404.title: 404 Response
Response404.description: The requested resource could not be found on the server.

Response500.title: 500 Response
Response500.description: An internal server error occurred while processing the request.

Response200Token.title: Access Token Response
Response200Token.description: Response to an access token request

IdToken.title: Access Token
IdToken.description: Access token used to make subsequent requests

RefreshToken.title: Refresh Token
RefreshToken.description: Refresh token used in subsequent access token requests

PermissionsRetrieved.title: Permissions Information
PermissionsRetrieved.description: Information on a user's available permissions groups

DateOfRequest.title: Date Retrieved
DateOfRequest.description: The date that the notifications information was requested in ISO 8601 format

TaskRetrieved.title: Task Information
TaskRetrieved.description: Information on a particular party's task

DateOfRequest.title: Date Retrieved
DateOfRequest.description: The date that the task information was requested in ISO 8601 format

DocumentRetrieved.title: Document
DocumentRetrieved.description: A document retrieved for a specific load plan.

FilePostRequestBody.title: File upload
FilePostRequestBody.description: Specify the path to file(s) to be uploaded.

PhotosRetrieved.title: Photos
PhotosRetrieved.description: An object containing a list of photos associated with a loadplan.

photos.title: Photos List
photos.description: A list of photos associated with a loadplan.

items.title: Photo
items.description: A photo associated with a loadplan.

Address.title: Address
Address.description: The provided structured address for a given party

Carrier.title: Ocean Carrier
Carrier.description: The Ocean Carrier for use when containerised freight is moving by deep sea, this will show in Box 5b on the Annex VII

organizationId.title: A coded Identifier known as SCAC for Ocean Carriers
organizationId.description: Ocean Carriers use an identifying code known as SCAC

name.title: The Name of the Ocean Carrier
name.description: The Name of the carrier in freetext

Consignee.title: Consignee

organizationId.title: A coded identifier for the Consignee
organizationId.description: A coded value for the Consignee, for UK and Europe this should be the EORI if available or if not mutually agreed with Traqa.

name.title: Consignee Name
name.description: Free Text Name of the Consignee

Consignee.description: The Consignee is the person who will be receiving the consignment (material) they may not necessarily be the physical destination, this will show in Box 2 of the Annex VII

personName.title: Person Name
personName.description: The name, expressed as text, of this trade contact person.

telephone.title: Telephone
telephone.description: Telephone communication information for this trade contact.

emailAddress.title: Email Address
emailAddress.description: The email address for this trade contact.

customsDeclaration.title: Declare Customs
customsDeclaration.description: Specify whether you would like Traqa to submit a customs declaration to HMRC on your behalf for the load. Default is 'false'.

declaration.title: Customs Declaration Details
declaration.description: Customs declaration details used if Traqa has been tasked on submitting a customs declaration to HMRC on your behalf.

goodsLocation.title: Location of Goods
goodsLocation.description: Using the relevant codes, enter the location where the goods are located at the time they are declared and available for examination purposes. The Goods Location Code must be precise enough to allow Customs to carry out physical controls on the goods. DE 5/23 CDS, note use of CDS codes over CHIEF Codes as they are different. https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-trade-tariff-cds-volume-3-export-declaration-completion-guide/group-5-dates-times-periods-places-countries-and-regions#de-523-location-of-goods-box-30-location-of-goods

customsOfficeExit.title: Customs Office of Exit
customsOfficeExit.description: Using the relevant Union code, enter the customs office by which it is intended that the goods should leave the customs territory. DE 5/4 CDS

invoice.description: Details required for the Commercial Invoice and Customs Declaration

pricing.description: Select pricing, either per tonne in which case it is calculated from the weighed tonnage, or total in which case it will be used as is

amount.description: Enter the Price per Tonne or Total Amount indicated in the pricing indicator, this should be in the currency provided.

currency.description: Currency code as defined by ISO 4217

HarmonizeSystemCode.title: Harmonize System Code
HarmonizeSystemCode.description: The Harmonised Commodity Code of the material for Customs reporting purposes

LoadingSite.title: Loading Site

organizationId.title: Loading Site Code
organizationId.description: A registered BIC Facility Code to identify the facility the material is being loaded at

LoadingSite.description: The physical Loading Site of the Material which will provide weights to Traqa.  This will appear in Box 6 of the Annex VII

Loadplan.title: Load Plan

references.title: References
references.description: References for the movements in Traqa to identify the load and weighbridge ticket along with other useful references as needed and agreed between parties

carriersReferenceNumber.title: Carriers Reference Number
carriersReferenceNumber.description: The Ocean Carrier Booking Number used for tracking containers after loading, only useful for deep sea movements

shippersIdentifyingNumberForShipment.title: Shippers Identifying Number For Shipment
shippersIdentifyingNumberForShipment.description: A purchase order number for the shipment, could be from shipper or consignee

pickupReferenceNumber.title: Pickup Reference Number
pickupReferenceNumber.description: The loading reference the driver will provide to site on arrival, must be unique per load this is a key identifier in Traqa

portOfDischarge.title: Port Of Discharge
portOfDischarge.description: A coded reference to the location for the port of discharge, used in transport provided by the UN.  This determines the routing in the Annex VII for Box 11

dates.title: Dates

scheduledLoadingTransportEvent.title: The scheduledLoadingTransportEvent
scheduledLoadingTransportEvent.description: The planned date time of the loading at site, conform to yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss

dates.description: Dates that are relevent to the load plan, namely the planned date time of loading

tradeItem.title: Trade Item

description.title: Description of Goods
description.description: A free text description of the type of material that is being loaded/exported.  Populates Box 9 on the Annex VII

tradeItem.description: The detail for the type of material that is being loaded/exported

portOfLoading.title: Port Of Loading
portOfLoading.description: A coded reference to the location for the port of loading, used in transport provided by the UN, populates Box 11 on the Annex VII for origin country.

Loadplan.description: The Load Plan that is provided by the shipper to a load site via Traqa, this will create new loads in Traqa for loading at a site.

LoadplanCompleted.title: Completed Load Plan
LoadplanCompleted.description: The Load Plan that is provided by the shipper augmented with data provided by the loading site.

PERN.title: Packaging Export Recovery Note (PERN)
PERN.description: Information about a PERN thats required to appear on the Annex VII in Box 15, if not claiming a PERN omit from the load plan

percentage.title: Percentage of MT
percentage.description: Percentage of MT to be issued for PERN

RecoveryFacility.title: Recovery Facility

organizationId.title: A coded identifier for the Recovery Facility
organizationId.description: A coded value for the Recovery Facility, for UK and Europe this should be the EORI if available or if not mutually agreed with Traqa.

name.title: Recovery Facility Name
name.description: Free Text Name of the Recovery Facility

RecoveryFacility.description: The Recovery Facility should ONLY be provided when different to Box 2 (Consignee) if not provided it will default to Consignee.  This will populate Box 7 on the Annex VII

Shipper.title: Shipper
Shipper.description: The Shipper is the party who is exporting the material and submitting the load plan into Traqa, populates Box 1 on the Annex VII

organizationId.title: A coded Identifer for the Shipper
organizationId.description: The shipper Organisation Id is usually an EORI number assigned by a government, it can in place of this be a Traqa specific reference.

Buyer.title: Buyer
Buyer.description: Buyer/receiver of shipment. Overwrites the 'buyer' party shown on the commercial invoice

organizationId.title: A coded Identifier for the Buyer
organizationId.description: The buyer Organisation Id is usually an EORI number assigned by a government

UnitOfMeasure.title: Unit of Measure
UnitOfMeasure.description: Units of measure. The only accepted value is `KGM`

UNLocode.title: The UNLocode schema
UNLocode.description: A coded reference to the location provided by the UN OR the alpha-2 (ISO 3166) country code

value.title: Weight Value
value.description: The weight of the equipment, product or other

WeighingRecord.title: Weighing Record from Weighbridge to complete load

references.title: References

despatchNoteNumber.title: The despatchNoteNumber schema
despatchNoteNumber.description: The weighbridge ticket number from the loading site.

vehicleIdentificationNumber.title: The vehicleIdentificationNumber schema
vehicleIdentificationNumber.description: The registration number of the vehicle, populates box 5a on the Annex VII

pickupReferenceNumber.title: The pickupReferenceNumber schema
pickupReferenceNumber.description: The loading reference provided by the driver at site, must match the one from the load plan provided by Traqa

driverName.title: The driverName schema
driverName.description: Name of the driver. Populates box 5a on the Annex VII

references.description: References that are relevant to the Traqa loads and Shipper and Load Site to enable efficient exchange of loading data

transportEquipment.title: Transport Equipment
transportEquipment.description: The Trailier or Container that is loaded with the material from load site.

verifiedWeight.title: Verified Weight

weightVerificationMethod.title: Weight Verification Method
weightVerificationMethod.description: SOLAS VGM provides 2 methods, for all that are weighed at a weighbridge use method 1.

weighingDate.title: The weighingDate schema
weighingDate.description: Date of the weighing of trailer or container at a laoding site.  Populates Box 4 on the Annex VII

value.title: Value
value.description: The weight of the laden trailer or container including the tare weight of a container if appropriate

verifiedWeight.description: For container movements this container the Verified Gross Mass or VGM thats mandatory to enter a port for safety.

equipmentTareWeight.title: Equipment Tare Weight
equipmentTareWeight.description: The tare weight of the equipment (container or trailer) is required for containerised movements to calculate the VGM.

seal.title: Seal Number
seal.description: The seal number(s) used to seal the container or trailer after loading, multiple seal numbers can be present on a container, many only load with 1 or for trailers not always used.

items.title: Seal Number
items.description: The seal number used on the transport equipment

equipmentNumber.title: Equipment Number
equipmentNumber.description: The Container Number OR the Trailer number that the goods have been loaded onto

equipmentType.title: Equipment Type
equipmentType.description: The ISO Size Type for Deep Sea Containers

haulier.title: Haulier

organizationId.title: A coded Identifier for the haulier who arrives at site
organizationId.description: The haulier identifier is the waste carrier license number, mandated by the EA.

haulier.description: The Haulier who arrives at site to trasport the goods.  Populates box 5a on the Annex VII and verified with the EA

dates.title: Dates

actualDepartureTransportEvent.title: The actualDepartureTransportEvent schema
actualDepartureTransportEvent.description: The Actual Departure of the laden vehicle from Loading Site from final weigh, populates box 4 on the Annex VII for Departure Time.

actualArrivalTransportEvent.title: The actualArrivalTransportEvent schema
actualArrivalTransportEvent.description: The Actual Arrival of the empty vehicle at Loading Site for the first weigh

dates.description: Dates relevant to the actual movement of material provided by the loading site

grossWeight.description: Weight of the Material loaded for movement, populates Box 2 on the Annex VII

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Number of Bales or other that were loaded.  Populates Box 3 on the Annex VII

packageTypeCode.title: Package
packageTypeCode.description: The package type code of the smallest external packing unit eg. BL or BN

WeighingRecord.description: The Weight payload for a Loading Site to complete the weighing of planned Traqa loads, data comes from the weighbridge software.

TaskPostModel.title: Task Post Model
TaskPostModel.description: Model for posting data against a particular task

weighbridgeData.description: The Weight payload for a NILS to complete the weighing of planned Traqa loads, data comes from the weighbridge software and is verified manually by the Shipper.

references.title: References
references.description: References that are relevant to the Traqa loads and Shipper and NILS to enable efficient exchange of loading data

despatchNoteNumber.title: The despatchNoteNumber schema
despatchNoteNumber.description: The weighbridge ticket number from the loading site.

vehicleIdentificationNumber.title: The vehicleIdentificationNumber schema
vehicleIdentificationNumber.description: The registration number of the vehicle, populates box 5a on the Annex VII

pickupReferenceNumber.title: The pickupReferenceNumber schema
pickupReferenceNumber.description: The loading reference provided by the driver at site, must match the one from the load plan provided by Traqa

transportEquipment.title: Transport Equipment
transportEquipment.description: The Trailer or Container that is loaded with the material from load site.

verifiedWeight.title: Verified Weight
verifiedWeight.description: For container movements this container the Verified Gross Mass or VGM thats mandatory to enter a port for safety.

weighingDate.title: The weighingDate schema
weighingDate.description: Date of the weighing of trailer or container at a laoding site.  Populates Box 4 on the Annex VII

value.title: Value
value.description: The weight of the laden trailer or container including the tare weight of a container if appropriate

equipmentTareWeight.title: Equipment Tare Weight
equipmentTareWeight.description: The tare weight of the equipment (container or trailer) is required for containerised movements to calculate the VGM.

seal.title: Seal Number
seal.description: The seal number(s) used to seal the container or trailer after loading, multiple seal numbers can be present on a container, many only load with 1 or for trailers not always used.

items.title: Seal Number
items.description: The seal number used on the transport equipment

equipmentNumber.title: Equipment Number
equipmentNumber.description: The Container Number OR the Trailer number that the goods have been loaded onto

haulier.title: Haulier
haulier.description: The Haulier who arrives at site to trasport the goods.  Populates box 5a on the Annex VII and verified with the EA

organizationId.title: A coded Identifier for the haulier who arrives at site
organizationId.description: The haulier identifier is the waste carrier license number, mandated by the EA.

dates.title: Dates

actualDepartureTransportEvent.title: The actualDepartureTransportEvent schema
actualDepartureTransportEvent.description: The Actual Departure of the laden vehicle from Loading Site from final weigh, populates box 4 on the Annex VII for Departure Time.

actualArrivalTransportEvent.title: The actualArrivalTransportEvent schema
actualArrivalTransportEvent.description: The Actual Arrival of the empty vehicle at Loading Site for the first weigh

dates.description: Dates relevant to the actual movement of material provided by the loading site

grossWeight.description: Weight of the Material loaded for movement, populates Box 2 on the Annex VII

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Number of Bales or other that were loaded.  Populates Box 3 on the Annex VII
